name: TamilBooks
0:
”Alexa open tamil books”
”Alexa ask tamil books for aathichoodi of the day”
”Alexa ask tamil books aathichoodi for today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tamil books
des:
Alexa Tamil books bring tamil literature to our home through alexa enabled devices and applications. Currently tamil books supports Aathichoodi, we will be adding support to more literature and other learning tools for tamil.

*The Āathichoodi (Tamil: ஆத்திசூடி) is a collection of single-line quotations written by Avvaiyar. 


How to use:
Alexa, ask tamil books for aathichoodi of the day.
or
Alexa open tamil books.

If you like this skill please rate it and share any feedback you might have to feedback@k-7.org
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
